title.rendered: Orchard Bistro Dining Set – various options

content.rendered:
The Orchard Outdoor Bistro Dining Set comprises: two of our stackable Orchard chairs plus our Orchard Bistro Dining Table with a Topalit Laminate top for great integrity. 

The Orchard Chair is stackable 3 high and is made with an aluminium frame and a rattan effect polypropylene seat and backrest. 

The Orchard Table Base is made from painted aluminium, suitable for indoor and outdoor use. 

Ideal for commercial use, such as coffee shops, hotels and care homes. Easy to clean and care for – suitable for all weather, indoor and out!

1 year warranty.

Dimensions in mm:

– Orchard Armchair: 410D x 530W x 890H x 440 Seat Height

– Orchard Side Chair: 420D x 400W x 890H x 440 Seat Height

– Orchard Dining Base: 730H

– Topalit Top: overall 34mm thick with 26mm thick core

This item requires basic self assembly.
